PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-03882019-04-26,  ,  ,  PMO,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectAlternative to the Acting Ministers Minute
PrecisAlternative OIC to the Acting Ministers Minute, appointing those Cabinet Ministers who may act for the President of the Queen's Privy Council for Canada and Minister of State to assist the Minister of Indian Affairs and Northern Development, if he is unable to perform the functions of his office.
AttachmentsAttachment
